li.a: Career and Technical Education Programs Nondiscrimination Notice

div.div: Congratulations Fruitvale High School for being ranked an A by TEA's Accountability system. The high school also received state distinctions for Math, Science, Top 25% Comparative Academic Growth, Top 25% Comparative Closing the Gaps, and Post Secondary Readiness Distinctions.

After you have registered with Fruitvale ISD, please click here for the Head Start online pre-application: https://www.esc7.net/page/headstart.parentresources Once you click that link, you will see: 1) Resources for Families 2) Then click on Learn more about the application process (English or Spani...Read more...

Fruitvale ISD will be serving lunches from 11:00 until 12:30 or until we run out of lunches. There is also instructional pickup if your teacher has indicated that you need to pick up work this week. We can serve our enrolled students with a parent picking up food for them with id, the enrolled stude...Read more...

div.a: COVID-19 UPDATE by Superintendent Mrs. Bain

div.div: March 18, 2020 Bobcat Family: Fruitvale ISD will be closed the week of March 23-March 27, we will give further guidance as to the length of closure for the year after meetings tomorrow are completed with CDC, county superintendents, the commissioner and the school board.
